events.title: Meet the ACM Student Chapter at ASU
events.description: The ACM Student Chapter at ASU is a brand new computing club chartered by the ACM, the world's largest computing society. Stop by to meet the team, learn about the benefits of membership, and play CS trivia for prizes.

events.title: The ACM Student Chapter at ASU: A historic first night
events.description: Join us for an overview of this brand new computing club from its leaders, a preview of collaborations from representatives of the largest computing clubs, and a talk from an ACM faculty on their ACM experience. Social hour to follow with food and refreshments.

events.title: ACM Industry Networking and Information Session
events.description: Join us to learn about about job and internship opportunities for ACM at ASU members, then network with ACM professionals in industry, with food and refreshments.

events.title: ACM Academic Networking and Information Session
events.description: Join us to learn about research and scholarship opportunities for ACM at ASU members, then network with ACM professionals in academia, with food and refreshments.

events.title: ACM Student Research Symposium
events.description: Join us to support or participate in a rare event, where undergraduate researchers from the ACM at ASU will present research before a body of ACM professionals from the ASU campus and around the world. Questions and feedback to follow.

events.title: ACM Distinguished Speaker
events.description: Join us in welcoming our renowned guest from the ACM's Distinguished Speaker Series for their talk on their groundbreaking work. Meet and greet to follow with food and refreshments.

events.title: Farewell Game Night and Social
events.description: Join us for the last event of the semester! Take a break from studies for a fun, relaxing evening reflecting on this semester with friends, games, trivia, prizes, food and refreshments
